channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- LoginWP (Formerly Peter's Login Redirect)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- LoginWP (Formerly Peter's Login Redirect)

item.title: CVE-2021-24939|2024-08-03T19:49:13.832Z -- unknown -- loginwp%20%28formerly%20peter%27s%20login%20redirect%29
item.description: The LoginWP (Formerly Peter's Login Redirect) WordPress plugin before 3.0.0.5 does not sanitise and escape the rul_login_url and rul_logout_url parameter before outputting them back in attributes in an admin page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
